sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Newborn Eye Pathology Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Newborn Eye Pathology Act.

sections.heading: Policy. It is the policy of the State of Illinois to make efforts to detect pediatric congenital ocular abnormalities that lead to premature death, blindness, or vision impairment unless treated soon after birth
sections.text: Policy. It is the policy of the State of Illinois to make efforts to detect pediatric congenital ocular abnormalities that lead to premature death, blindness, or vision impairment unless treated soon after birth.

sections.heading: Rules. The Department of Public Health shall adopt rules necessary to implement this Act.
sections.text: Rules. The Department of Public Health shall adopt rules necessary to implement this Act.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect July 1, 2005.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect July 1, 2005.
